baseRule.text: 若比丘尼。食蒜者波夜提(八十事竟)。
baseRule.label: Classical Chinese Mahāsaṅghika Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 80

fullParallels.text: Yā pana bhikkhunī lasuṇaṁ khādeyya pācittiyaṁ.
fullParallels.label: Paḷī Theravāda Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 1

translations.text: Welche Nonne aber Knoblauch ißt, muß dafür sühnen.
Should any bhikkhuni eat garlic, it is to be confessed.
Jika ada Bhikkhuni yang memakan bawang putih, itu harus di akui.

fullParallels.text: 若比丘尼噉蒜波逸提(七十)。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Mahīśāsaka Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 70

fullParallels.text: 若比丘尼噉生熟蒜。波夜提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Sarvāstivāda Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 72

fullParallels.text: 若復苾芻尼噉蒜者。波逸底迦。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Mūlasarvāstivāda Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 73
